duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and communicate with ITD management and staff to coordinate work tasks and resourcing.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand project requirements and support data management needs.
Manage and maintain the cloud infrastructure and software systems.
Analyze data and provide insights to support decision-making by project management teams.
Ensure documentation of requirements and uses cases, facilitate design workshops for assigned project.
Maintain project budget, plans, tasks, schedules, risks, and status and disseminates information to team members and customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
PMP Certification through PMI or VITA's PM Certification
